line_2: Light on his back the sportive Damsel bounds,

line_1: And sweep resistless o'er the cultured grounds;
line_2: Watch, where proud Surges break their treacherous mounds,

line_1: — Dash'd in dread conflict on the rocky grounds,
line_2: Crash the shock'd masts, the staggering wreck rebounds;

line_1: Amidst thy tangling walks, and ruin'd grounds,
line_2: Here as I take my solitary rounds,
